S. Korean unionists opposed to medical insurance hike
articles.content:
S. Korean unionists opposed to medical insurance hike 
    Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Over 1,500 members of the medical workers' union and other unions under the South Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally in Seoul on March 24 against medical insurance hike, according to Seoul-based MBC.
 Charging that "the authorities try to raise medical insurance by shifting the responsibility for the failure to finance the health insurance on to the people," the unionists demanded the "government" adhere to the main orientation of health insurance reform.

articles.content:
Cooperation between governments of DPRK and china in field of science and technology 
    Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the 37th meeting of the inter-governmental committee for scientific and technological cooperation between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the People's Republic of China was signed in Beijing yesterday.
 Present at the signing ceremony were the members of the DPRK government science and technology delegation led by Kang Tong Gun, vice-president of the academy of sciences, and Li Xueyong, vice-minister of science and technology of China, and other officials concerned.    
 Kang Tong Gun and Li Xueyong separately inked a protocol.
